basic_info.name: AISSMS Institute of Information Technology Placement
description: The T&P cell of AISSMS Institute of Information Technology motivates and guides students to explore the domains of various career opportunities, entrepreneurship and enhance functional skills by providing industrial training, industry associated projects & enhancing employability skills by honing aptitude skills, communication skills, GD & PI skills. The placement cell is dedicated to identify probable employers & conduct campus interviews. The AISSMS Institute of Information Technology invites experts from industries to guide the students on latest technology, expectations from industries and different career options. T&P cell also acts as an information source for opportunities in higher education and their qualifying examinations such as GATE, CAT, GRE etc. It has over 300 placement recruitment drive every year.

It offers a number of scholarships and financial aid to the deserving students.

basic_info.name: AISSMS Institute of Information Technology FAQs

Section.name: About AISSMS Institute of Information Technology
Section.description:
AISSMS Institute of Information Technology, Pune was established in the year 1992, is affiliated to SPPU, Pune and is approved by AICTE. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the field of Engineering and Technology. Admission to AISSMS Institute of Information Technology is done on the basis of JEE Main/MHT CET/ GATE scores. In addition to this, the institute has a dedicated Training and Placement cell that provides 100% placement assistance to the students. Some of the top recruiters are TCS, Oracle, Accenture, L & T, Wipro, SKF, Godrej, Tech Mahindra, Emerson, etc. Check: AISSMS Institute of Information Technology Pune Cutoff
Table of Content
AISSMS Institute of Information Technology offers UG and PG courses in the field of Engineering and Technology. Tabulated below are the details regarding the same:
Check: AISSMS Institute of Information Technology Pune Courses and Fees
The T&P cell of AISSMS Institute of Information Technology motivates and guides students to explore the domains of various career opportunities, entrepreneurship and enhance functional skills by providing industrial training, industry associated projects & enhancing employability skills by honing aptitude skills, communication skills, GD & PI skills. The placement cell is dedicated to identify probable employers & conduct campus interviews. The AISSMS Institute of Information Technology invites experts from industries to guide the students on latest technology, expectations from industries and different career options. T&P cell also acts as an information source for opportunities in higher education and their qualifying examinations such as GATE, CAT, GRE etc. It has over 300 placement recruitment drive every year.
AISSMS Institute of Information Technology ensures that no student has to leave their education in between due to the lack of finances. The Institute extends scholarships and financial assistance to the meritorious students based on their academic achievements and performance. It offers a number of scholarships and financial aid to the deserving students.

The total number of faculty at AISSMS Institute of Information Technology is 25 and the number of faculty out of which 5 members are PhD holders.

Ques. Are part time courses offered by AISSMS Institute of Information Technology?
Ans. No, part-time courses are not offered in AISSMS Institute of Information Technology. The institute only offers full-time courses.
Ques. I am 20 years old. Can I apply for M.E at AISSMS Institute of Information Technology?
Ans. No, you are not eligible to apply for the M.E course. The candidate needs to be at least 21 years of age to apply for admission to the course.
Ques. Does AISSMS Institute of Information Technology provide hostel facilities?
Ans. Yes, AISSMS Institute of Information Technology provides hostel facilities for the students. It provides separate hostels for boys and girls and are equipped with all basic amenities.
Ques. What is the intake for B.E courses offered at AISSMS Institute of Information Technology?
Ans. The intake for different departments of B.E. varies. Mentioned below are the details regarding the same:
